alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Caldwell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 21 at 7:40PM CDT until March 21 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL CALDWELL AND SOUTHWESTERN BASTROP COUNTIES... At 740 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lockhart, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Lockhart, Mustang Ridge, Brownsboro, McMahan, Tilmon, Lytton Springs, Dale, Bateman, St John Colony and Taylorsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
